pkgmetadata.longdescription: Soft Windowing on Linear Regression // The main function in the package utilizes a windowing function in the form of an exponential weighting function to linear models. The bandwidth and sharpness of the window are controlled by two parameters. Then, a series of tests are used to identify the right parameters of the window (see Hamed Haselimashhadi et al (2019) https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/656678v1).
